Package atmmachine

Class Account

java.lang.Object
atmmachine.Account
Direct Known Subclasses:
ChequingAccount, SavingAccount
public abstract class Account extends Object
This is a abstract class that serves as a blueprint to SavingAccount class and ChequingAccount class
